channel.title: What have I learned?
channel.description: A brief description of my blog

item.title: OpenAi
item.description: ChatGPT was used for much of this project. So many of these topics I have never really had to apply. This made it quite a difficult learning curve. This made it cost me a lot of time. But i think i made the best of it with my limited experience in web design.

item.title: GSAP
item.description: GSAP (GreenSock Animation Platform) was fun to tinker a bit with. It is a powerful tool that I will definitely use again. It's also pretty easy to use. Once you understand the basics, you can create some pretty cool animations.

item.title: Web Workers
item.description: This article provides a comprehensive introduction to Web Workers, a feature that allows web applications to run scripts in background threads. It covers how Web Workers can enhance performance by offloading tasks from the main thread, how to create and manage Web Workers, and key use cases and best practices for their implementation.

item.title: OpenLayers
item.description: Using openlayers was still pretty obvious though. since I had used this before and that the documentation is also very good.

item.title: Google Tag Manager
item.description: figuring out how this works took a lot of time anyway since this goes through a lot of revisions and finding up to date information was not always easy. youtube was a great help here

item.title: Google Analytics
item.description: It tracks things like opening the sidebar, scrolling , zooming in and out on the map, clicking a country and link.

item.title: RSS-feed
item.description: The rss feed link is available in the head of the web page which should make it discoverable. You can also copy the link manually and then copy it into an rss feed reader yourself.

item.title: functional CSS library
item.description: Did not manage to implement css is not my strength point

item.title: Web-accessibility
item.description: I did my best to fill this out. But honestly have no idea if it is correct do not really possess the knowledge to fill all this out and was quite overwhelming.
